/* 관리자페이지 부스 뱃지 내역 건수 */ select count(a.cust_id) as row_count from ( select ecm.cust_id from ev_cust_mst ecm left outer join ev_comm_code ecc on ecm.category1 = ecc.cd_id left outer join ev_cust_badge ecb on ecm.cust_id = ecb.cust_id and ecb.ev_expo_id = #{ev_expo_id} where ecm.cust_sts_cd = '105001' /*정상*/ and ecm.cust_clsf_cd = #{cust_clsf_sh} /* 참관/참여 */
and exists (select 1 from ev_cust_mst where cust_id = ecb.give_cust_id and category1 = #{category_sh} ) /*카테고리 검색조건*/
and exists (select 1 from ev_cust_mst z left outer join ev_comm_code y on z.category1 = y.cd_id where z.cust_id = ecb.give_cust_id and upper(y.cd_nm) like upper(concat('%',#{category_nm_sh}, '%')) ) /*카테고리 검색조건*/
and ecm.ins_dtm between #{ins_dt_fr} and #{ins_dt_to} /* 날짜검색조건 */
group by ecm.cust_id, ecm.cust_nm ) a

select count(*) as row_count from ev_cust_mst ecm where ecm.cust_sts_cd = '105001' /*정상*/ and ecm.cust_clsf_cd = #{cust_clsf_sh} and ecm.ins_dtm between #{ins_dt_fr} and #{ins_dt_to} /* 날짜검색조건 */
and exists (select 1 from ev_expo_customer where ev_expo_id = #{ev_expo_id} and cust_id = ecm.cust_id)
and ecm.category1 = #{category_sh}
and exists (select 1 from ev_comm_code where cd_id = ecm.category1 and cd_nm like concat('%',#{category_nm_sh},'%'))
select sum(badge_cnt) as cnt from ev_cust_badge where cust_id = #{cust_id}
